    Hell Beast looked over the crowd standing before him. Apollo chose the 
body, and in fact controlled it. This wasnt the real Hell Beast, just a 
replica to get a rather messy job done.
    "What are you trying to pull? Put your hands in the air or prepare to get 
fried!" Aracnia said as she drew her bowcaster.
    Hell Beast, better yet, Apollo, laughed at her. "Foolish transformer. You 
do not know what your dealing with. Stand aside or I will be forced to 
destroy you."
    Tarantulas didnt like it ethier. He hated the Vok, and these Aliens were 
far more annoying. "What do you want, exactly. Maximals? We have three of 
them.....take them if you like."
    Hell Beast glanced over to them. The Armada would be able to drain there 
energy to power several different functions. "Very well. I will take the 
Maximals. But for now I am going into that bunker to further my 
investigation."
    The Predacons agreed and let him go, but what no one saw was Megatron 
sneaking away secretly, back to the Cave.
